Use the Quarto Command Line Interface (CLI) to interact with Quarto from the terminal or command prompt:

``` {.bash filename="Terminal"}
quarto render document.qmd
```

Get help by appending `--help` to any command:

``` {.bash filename="Terminal"}
quarto render --help
```
